price: ishee keessatti homaa hin argine Mana Muslimtootaa irraa ta’e tokko malee.
arabic: فَمَا وَجَدۡنَا فِيهَا غَيۡرَ بَيۡتٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: famā wajadnā fīhā ghayra baytin mina al-mus'limīna
